allPatientsSection.title: ALL PATIENTS
allPatientsSection.none: no patients available in import folder

backToImportStepModal.title: Confirm going back
backToImportStepModal.body: Confirm restarting current case and going back to the import step.

loadCaseFromImportFolderModal.title: Confirm loading case
loadCaseFromImportFolderModal.body: Confirm loading case from import folder.

errors.caseNotAvailableInImportFolder: Case is not available in import folder

section1.line1: Drag and drop a case folder to get started

errors.noCameraVendorMatch: Uploaded folder doesn't match to any camera vendor
errors.noSituScanAvailable: Folder does not contain a Pre-operative scan
errors.noObjFileType: Uploaded folder doesn't contain OBJ files

deleteProfile.title: Delete my profile?
deleteProfile.description: You will receive an email to confirm your decision

modal.title: Delete your account?
modal.description: For security purposes, please re-enter your password below.

occlusalContactStrength.title: Occlusal contact strength
occlusalContactStrength.subtitle: Choose your preferred initial strength of contact to the antagonist

light.description: Initial contact will be less than 25 microns into antagonist

medium.description: Initial contact will be between 25 and 50 microns into antagonist

heavy.description: Initial contact will be greater than 50 microns into antagonist

proximalContactStrength.title: Proximal contact strength
proximalContactStrength.subtitle: Choose your preferred initial strength of proximal contacts

light.description: Initial contact will be less than 25 microns into neighbouring tooth

medium.description: Initial contact will be between 25 and 50 microns into neighbouring tooth

heavy.description: Initial contact will be greater than 50 microns into neighbouring tooth

occlusalMinimalThickness.title: Minimal thickness body: Occlusal
occlusalMinimalThickness.subtitle: Define the height of the minimal thickness body

radialMinimalThickness.title: Minimal thickness body: Radial
radialMinimalThickness.subtitle: Define the radial width of the minimal thickness body

spacers.title: Spacer
spacers.subtitle: Spacer defines the cement/adhesive gap within the intaglio of the restoration

light.description: The spacer is set to 75 microns

medium.description: The spacer is set to 100 microns

heavy.description: The spacer is set to 125 microns

importFolder.title: Import folder
importFolder.subtitle: Define the folder from which Clinux will import your new cases

exportFolder.title: Export folder
exportFolder.subtitle: Define the folder to which Clinux will export your finished cases

dentalNotation.title: Dental notation
dentalNotation.subtitle: Choose your preferred tooth numbering standard

importCaseFolder.title: Import your case folder
importCaseFolder.tip: Either drag your case folder onto the canvas or select it using the Choose folder button.

drawPreparationMargin.title: Draw preparation margin
drawPreparationMargin.tip: Use your cursor to create anchor points around the affected area. Don’t worry, this can be adjusted later!

adjustPreparationMargin.title: Adjust preparation margin
adjustPreparationMargin.tip: Use your cursor to create anchor points around the affected area. Don’t worry, this can be adjusted later!

confirmOrEditInsertionAxis.title: Confirm or edit insertion axis
confirmOrEditInsertionAxis.tip: Using the mouse, align the jaw so there is as little undercuts as possible. Undercuts are highlighted in yellow.

confirmOrEditCopyLine.title: Confirm or edit copy line
confirmOrEditCopyLine.tip: Review the automated copy line and edit if neccessary, press Next if you’re happy to proceed.

adjustMesialContact.title: Adjust mesial contact
adjustMesialContact.tip: You can adjust the crown using the form tools in your Tool Panel. Use the Contact and Thickness maps for more insights!

adjustDistalContact.title: Adjust distal contact
adjustDistalContact.tip: You can adjust the crown using the form tools in your Tool Panel. Use the Contact and Thickness maps for more insights!

adjustOcclusalContact.title: Adjust occlusal contact
adjustOcclusalContact.tip: You can adjust the crown using the form tools in your Tool Panel. Use the Contact and Thickness maps for more insights!

errors.defaultFolderNotSet: default import folder was not set up
errors.permissionNotGranted: permission to folder was not granted
errors.folderNotFound: import folder could not be found
errors.unknownError: unknown error with loading import folder

errors.defaultFolderNotSet: default export folder was not set up
errors.permissionNotGranted: permission to folder was not granted
errors.folderNotFound: export folder could not be found
errors.unknownError: unknown error exporting to export folder

installApp.title: Install app
installApp.description: For a better experience and offline mode, install Clinux to your device.

setParameters.title: Set your parameters
setParameters.description: Design parameters can be adjusted to suit your personal preferences.

setPreferences.title: Set your preferences
setPreferences.description: Export and Import folders need to be chosen before you can Export cases

completeProfile.title: Complete your profile
completeProfile.description: For optimum user experience and offline mode, install Clinux to your device

fileExportedToCaseFolderLocationSuccessf.message: File exported to case folder location successfully

selectedDentalCaseNotFoundInImportFolder.message: Selected dental case was not found in import folder

cannotStartNewCaseAfterRestartError.message: Cannot start new case after case restart

title.oneFound: We've found a new case in your imports folder, would you like to import it?
title.twoFound: We've found 2 new cases in your imports folder, would you like to import it?
title.threeFound: We've found 3 new cases in your imports folder, would you like to import it?
